Comment 3: 
Indeed. I was thinking that it might look like this (to avoid unnecessary confusion):

ConstDecl      = "const" ( ConstSpec | "(" { ShortConstSpec ";" } ")" ) .
ConstSpec      = IdentifierList [ Type ] "=" ExpressionList .
ShortConstSpec = IdentifierList [ [ Type ] "=" ExpressionList ] .

On second thought, maybe these new rules do not seem like a worthwhile improvement over
the rules in the specification.

If there are no votes from the Go team in favor of adding the ShortConstSpec rule, I
would suggest to close this issue.
